SELECT c_gateway.id gateway_id, c_gateway.gateway_code, c_gateway_attr1.`name`, IFNULL(exist_client.number,0) number, COUNT(c_client_gateway.c_client_id) total FROM c_gateway LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway ON c_gateway.id = c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c_gateway_term.c_gateway_id,count(c_client_term2.c_client_id) number FROM c_term LEFT JOIN c_gateway_term ON c_term.id = c_gateway_term.c_term_id LEFT JOIN c_client_term2 ON c_gateway_term.id = c_client_term2.c_gateway_term_id WHERE c_term.id = #{pd.term_id} GROUP BY c_gateway_term.c_gateway_id ) exist_client ON c_gateway.id = exist_client.c_gateway_id WHERE
c_gateway_attr1.RLstatus = '2' and c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids} and c_client_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids}
and ( c_gateway_attr1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}),'%') )
GROUP BY c_gateway.id

SELECT c_client.id client_id, c_client.client_code, c_client_attr1.`name` FROM c_client_gateway LEFT JOIN c_client ON c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_client.id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id WHERE c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id = #{pd.gateway_id} and c_client_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids} and NOT EXISTS( SELECT c_gateway_term.c_gateway_id,c_client_term2.c_client_id FROM c_term LEFT JOIN c_gateway_term ON c_term.id = c_gateway_term.c_term_id LEFT JOIN c_client_term2 ON c_gateway_term.id = c_client_term2.c_gateway_term_id WHERE c_term.id = #{pd.term_id} and c_gateway_term.c_gateway_id = c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id and c_client_term2.c_client_id = c_client_gateway.c_client_id )
and ( c_client_attr1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_client.client_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}),'%') )
